data.name: Awaken The Time
data.detailed_description:
Awaken The Time is a third-person time-traveling adventure
set in a post-apocalyptic world where the last surviving
god travels across different lifetimes. It’s a unique story divided
into 5 Chapters containing different time periods and gameplay
styles.


3 GamePlay styles and 5 Acts:


Act 1(Past)


In the first act, you are a samurai that can wield multiple fighting styles: melee, archery, and magic.
Act 2


You go into the garage and you’ll find a companion from the maze. And he will throw you in the future.
Act 3


A survivor in a post-apocalyptic environment. Shooting through hordes of zombies and survivors.
Act 4


You will find a suit that can control time and find this captive entity.

Act 5


You will be betrayed by your AI and another entity that wants you trapped because he can’t kill you.

data.short_description: One entity different bodies, different time zones, one storyline but different background stories in different time periods.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
Awaken the Time is owned by Gacriva Studio.
Awaken the Time can not be sold other than Gacriva Studio.
